name: Super Mario WII
description: Too slow? Try it here! - https://turbowarp.org/#433296825 Original Release Date - October 29th, 2020 Welcome... to Super Mario Bros. Wii! In Mario's newest adventure, or should I say... oldest? Its a blast from the past combining new with old! Soar sky high with the propeller mushroom, or roast your foes with the fire flower! The choice is yours in Super Mario Bros. Wii! PLEASE READ THE INSTRUCTIONS!! - Instructions - Use arrow keys/WASD or mobile controls to move Press space/Y or the power button to use your power up Press X to hide the mobile button Collect 100 coins for a 1UP! - Features - 4 Power Ups 4 Levels A Timer A Lives System Custom  Level 4 Will Be Finished Soon! This game took 2 months to make and it is still being worked on! A love and favorite would be nice :D Please do not advertise or make small change remixes!  DeviantArt, The Spriters Resource - Music - Me, Nintendo, Midi Clef (App I used to make music) - Sounds - Nintendo Mario and everything associated with him are properties of with Nintendo. I am not in any way shape or form part of Nintendo Update History - 8/28/20, Ver. 0.0, Game Created 10/29/20, Ver. 0.1, Game Shared (3 Levels) 10/30/20, Ver. 0.2, Mario is slower, Fixed level flag glitches, Propeller Mario has proper animations, goombas are a tad slower 11/01/20, Ver. 0.3, Mobile Mode is here! 11/10/20, Ver. 0.4, Bug Fixes 11/16/20, Ver. 0.5, More Bug Fixes along with the addition of an end credits sequence and the end of the 4th level. I will add a boss fight but not right now
